attributes.action: No Confidence Vote Norfolk Job Centre Services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please sign this petition if you are currently using Job Centre or Job Centre Plus services in Norfolk. Your signature will act as a vote for a public enquiry into why Norfolk Job Center’s are failing to provide adequate services and will also act as a vote of no confidence in regional and local management of the Job Centre. Examples of poor service are detailed below.


Unacceptable delays in service / benefit delivery times, 
Poorly constructed benefit application forms,
Unfair decisions by Benefit Delivery Centre,
Customer Charter breeches,
Complaints Procedure breeches,
Lack of provision regarding training or job searches,
Inaccurate, misleading or withholding of Information,
Frequent loss of paperwork,
Unable to contact Job Centre Services,
Poor administration,
Anything else relevant
